tool_description: Manages version control for knowledge base articles, tracking changes, maintaining revision history, and enabling rollback capabilities for content management.

action_type.description: Version action: create_version, get_history, compare_versions, or rollback

change_description.description: Description of changes made in this version

version_from.description: Source version number for comparison or rollback

error_messages: Invalid action type: Must be one of create_version, get_history, compare_versions, or rollback
Article not found: Specified article_id does not exist
Change description required: change_description must be provided for create_version action
Version numbers required: version_from and version_to must be provided for compare_versions action
Version not found: Specified version number does not exist for this article
Rollback not allowed: Cannot rollback to a version newer than the current version
usage: Provide article_id and action_type. For create_version, include change_description. For compare_versions, specify both version_from and version_to. For rollback, specify version_from as the target version.

current_version.description: Current version number of the article

version_history.description: List of all version numbers and timestamps

action_result.description: Result message of the performed action
